items.title: Details on the free A's game in April 2018
items.summary: The 2018 regular-season schedule, released by Major League Baseball on Tuesday, features a free A's game for all fans at the Coliseum.
items.content: The 2018 regular-season schedule, released by Major League Baseball on Tuesday, features a free A's game for all fans at the Coliseum.

alternate.title: Details on the free A's game in April 2018

items.title: Still no timetable for Fowler's return from DL
items.summary: A timetable for Dexter Fowler's return remains undetermined, as the center fielder continues to deal with swelling in his left knee from the collision he sustained with the outfield wall trying to make a catch on Saturday. That means his status for a critical weekend series at Wrigley Field remains questionable.
items.content: A timetable for Dexter Fowler's return remains undetermined, as the center fielder continues to deal with swelling in his left knee from the collision he sustained with the outfield wall trying to make a catch on Saturday. That means his status for a critical weekend series at Wrigley Field remains questionable.

alternate.title: Still no timetable for Fowler's return from DL

items.title: Abreu blossoming amid White Sox rebuild
items.summary: Frank Thomas hit until he was 40. He wasn't always healthy, of course, but he never stopped being a threat. Miguel Cabrera is on a similar path, although he has finally slowed a little in his age-34 season. We mention this because Jose Abreu is playing at 30 this season and you wouldn't know he wasn't still a kid of 28 or 29.
items.content: Frank Thomas hit until he was 40. He wasn't always healthy, of course, but he never stopped being a threat. Miguel Cabrera is on a similar path, although he has finally slowed a little in his age-34 season. We mention this because Jose Abreu is playing at 30 this season and you wouldn't know he wasn't still a kid of 28 or 29.

alternate.title: Abreu blossoming amid White Sox rebuild

items.title: Twins select Moya's contract, DFA Vielma
items.summary: The Twins selected the contract of left-handed reliever Gabriel Moya from Double-A Chattanooga on Tuesday, and designated shortstop Engelb Vielma for assignment to make room for Moya on the 40-man roster.
items.content: The Twins selected the contract of left-handed reliever Gabriel Moya from Double-A Chattanooga on Tuesday, and designated shortstop Engelb Vielma for assignment to make room for Moya on the 40-man roster.

alternate.title: Twins select Moya's contract, DFA Vielma

items.title: Rizzo wants Cubs to keep positive outlook
items.summary: As far as Anthony Rizzo is concerned, the Cubs have the same goal on Sept. 12 that they did on April 1: Win games.
items.content: As far as Anthony Rizzo is concerned, the Cubs have the same goal on Sept. 12 that they did on April 1: Win games.

alternate.title: Rizzo wants Cubs to keep positive outlook

items.title: Capps (blood clot) back on DL, done for year
items.summary: Padres right-hander Carter Capps is done for the season after being placed on the 60-day disabled list with a blood clot on Tuesday. San Diego also announced that it selected the contract of right-hander Cory Mazzoni from Triple-A El Paso.
items.content: Padres right-hander Carter Capps is done for the season after being placed on the 60-day disabled list with a blood clot on Tuesday. San Diego also announced that it selected the contract of right-hander Cory Mazzoni from Triple-A El Paso.

alternate.title: Capps (blood clot) back on DL, done for year

items.title: Stallings back with Bucs after good year in Minors
items.summary: Jacob Stallings made it to the Majors last year because the Pirates had a need for catching help and he had a reputation as a strong defender. His work behind the plate is still highly regarded, but Stallings also has caught the Pirates' attention with his bat this season.
items.content: Jacob Stallings made it to the Majors last year because the Pirates had a need for catching help and he had a reputation as a strong defender. His work behind the plate is still highly regarded, but Stallings also has caught the Pirates' attention with his bat this season.

alternate.title: Stallings back with Bucs after good year in Minors
